A

Source: R/reactflow.R
reactflow.Rd

A

Usage

reactflow(
  nodes,
  edges,
  controls = NULL,
  mini_map = NULL,
  background = NULL,
  allow_edge_connection = TRUE,
  use_dagre = FALSE,
  dagre_direction = c("LR", "TB"),
  dagre_config = list(nodeWidth = 200, nodeHeight = 40),
  ...,
  width = NULL,
  height = NULL,
  elementId = NULL
)

Arguments

...

elements passed to ReactFlow (see https://reactflow.dev/api-reference/react-flow)

width

a

height

a

elementId

a

message

a
